author: The First
title: HIGH TIMES! House Approves Measure to Legalize Marijuana Nationwide

sentence: “The left will not let the Democrats do what needs to be done with the inflation problem, the energy problem, the illegal immigration problem on the southern border,” Representative Jim Jordan (R-OH) said.

title: House Votes To Legalize Marijuana; Dems Applaud It As ‘Racial Justice Bill’
